main event: A witness observed a brilliant, pulsating light in the northern sky that moved swiftly in Raceland, Kentucky on April 7, 1966.
interesting points: The light appeared to be oval-shaped and about the size of a large star., The light hovered before moving slowly, then took off at a tremendous speed in a northeasterly direction., The witness was certain it was not an airplane, satellite, or any known object., The sighting lasted several minutes., The witness reported having 20/20 vision and no impairments.
